channel.title: Need a hoster for my server
channel.description:
I'm looking for a hoster for my server, because my internet is extremely horrible, and I can only host 5 people at a time before it starts lagging for everyone.
This is a link to my server advertisement:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,42466.0.html
Add me on msn if you are willing to help:
crazy4crz@aol.com
Thanks ahead of time, -Fuzzy

item.title: Need a hoster for my server
item.dc:creator: @Warm_n_Fuzzy Warm_n_Fuzzy
item.description:
@Warm_n_Fuzzy wrote:

flamy:

i dunno…wierd cause i dont kknow but it hink u do to lol wierd!

You know, people might be able to understand you if you spelled words correctly and if you used correct grammar, because I have no clue what you just said there.

Hyper - I talked to you on MSN, and if you can get those ports working or w/e was wrong, then you can host my server.

Oilman - Do you have MSN? are we going to have to talk to eachother through a series of PM’s or what?

Until someone actually starts to host it, I’m still looking for hosters, so continue to post if you can and will host my server. Thanks! :)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 27, 2006, 09:20:02 AM[/size][hr]Back from away now, looking for a hoster before the end of today (monday) because I won’t be on tuesday-friday.

Read full topic
